definition: an embarrassing mistake, to utter impulsively
details:
noun
- an embarrassing mistake
= synonyms: blooper, bloomer, bungle, pratfall, foul-up, fuckup, flub, botch, boner, boo-boo
verb
- to utter impulsively
= example: to utter impulsively
= synonyms: ejaculate, blurt out, blurt, blunder out
- to make one's way clumsily or blindly
= example: to make one's way clumsily or blindly
= synonyms: fumble
- to commit a faux pas or make a serious mistake
= example: to commit a faux pas or make a serious mistake
= synonyms: sin, boob, goof, drop the ball
